org.joone.io
Class URLInputSynapse

java.lang.Object
  org.joone.engine.Synapse
      org.joone.io.StreamInputSynapse
          org.joone.io.URLInputSynapse
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputPatternListener, InputPluginListener, InputSynapse, org.joone.inspection.Inspectable, Learnable, NeuralElement, OutputPatternListener, java.io.Serializable
public class URLInputSynapse
extends StreamInputSynapse

Allows data extraction from the internet or a file specified by a Universal Resource Locator or URL.

See Also:
